activities:
We are a Precognitive Intelligence company. We blend cognitive technologies, data science and digital media to answer with simplicity the key questions that drive all businesses. 

Our vision: In our connected world everyone is on a journey, constantly moving from one digital destination to another, searching for what makes them happy.

Our mission: We develop technologies to anticipate why, how, when, and where people will go next. We call this Precognitive Intelligence.

Our work: We deliver this actionable intelligence about what exactly will make people happy, giving our clients an unprecedented competitive advantage. We leverage this data to achieve tangible business objectives, influencing people’s digital journey.

Our impact: Precognitive Intelligence makes people happy because they engage more naturally with brands through relevant content. Precognitive Intelligence makes our clients happy because it’s simple, measurable and more efficiency than traditional models.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

personaldata: None - Our busniness intelligence is developed using anonymous (Non-Personally-Identifiable) data.
